analysis.description:
GigaGivingToken.safeWithdrawal (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#181-201) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(msg.sender,tokenSupply) (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#197-198)

GigaGivingToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#109-110)
GigaGivingToken.fundingGoal should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#86)
GigaGivingToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#106)
GigaGivingToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#107-108)
GigaGivingToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#108-109)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#132-138:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
Token.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#10-11) should be declared external
StandardToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#41-45) should be declared external
Token.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#12-13) should be declared external
StandardToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#32-41) should be declared external
StandardToken.approve (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#45-51) should be declared external
Token.approve (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#13-14) should be declared external
StandardToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#51-57) should be declared external
Token.allowance (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#14-15) should be declared external
GigaGivingToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#130-139) should be declared external
GigaGivingToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#139-170) should be declared external
GigaGivingToken.checkGoalReached (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#174-180) should be declared external
GigaGivingToken.safeWithdrawal (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#181-201) should be declared external
GigaGivingToken.enableRefunds (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#1): it allows old versions

Low level call in GigaGivingToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#130-139):
	-require(bool)(_spender.call(bytes4(bytes32(sha3()(receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes)))),msg.sender,_value,this,_extraData)) /unique_chucks/21/0x464e6abc2f9a61cd17e6c52ad06802fbb4af7eab.sol#132-138
